title: Leveraging Bitstream Metadata for Fast, Accurate, Generalized Compressed Video Quality Enhancement. (arXiv:2202.00011v2 [eess.IV] UPDATED)
abstract: Video compression is a central feature of the modern internet powering technologies from social media to video conferencing. While video compression continues to mature, for many compression settings, quality loss is still noticeable. These settings nevertheless have important applications to the efficient transmission of videos over bandwidth constrained or otherwise unstable connections. translated_title: 利用比特流元数据快速、准确、泛化地压缩视频质量增强
translated_abstract: 视频压缩是现代互联网的核心功能，涵盖从社交媒体到视频会议等技术。虽然视频压缩不断成熟，但在许多压缩设置中，质量损失仍然很明显。然而，这些设置对于在带宽受限或不稳定的连接上高效传输视频具有重要应用。在本文中，我们开发了一个深度学习架构，能够利用嵌入视频比特流中的底层结构和动态信息，为压缩视频恢复细节。我们展示了这种方法相比于以前的压缩校正方法提高了恢复准确性，并且在实现更高吞吐量的同时，与最近的基于深度学习的视频压缩方法在速率-失真比上具有竞争力。此外，我们在模型上进行量化数据条件化，这可轻松地从比特流中获取。这使得我们的单一模型能够处理各种不同的压缩设置。
tldr: 本文提出了一种利用视频比特流元数据进行深度学习的压缩视频质量增强方法，在实现更高吞吐量的同时提高了压缩视频的还原准确性，具有重要的应用价值。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a deep learning-based method for enhancing compressed video quality by leveraging the underlying structure and motion information embedded in the video bitstream. The method improves restoration accuracy and achieves higher throughput compared to prior compression correction methods, and is competitive with recent deep-learning-based video compression methods on rate-distortion. The model can handle a variety of different compression settings by conditioning on readily available quantization data in the bitstream.
